item.title: Olivier Lavorel, of Isle of Man TT’s ‘mistaken identity’, has now died
item.description: Olivier Lavorel, who was incorrectly announced dead in a case of “mistaken identity” at the Isle of Man TT in June, has now died.
item.dc:creator: 114688

item.title: Isle of Man TT 2023 schedule: New 10-race calendar confirmed
item.description: The Isle of Man TT has confirmed its 10-race schedule for 2023.
item.dc:creator: 114688

item.title: Absent Dunlop's record smashed by dominant Todd at Armoy
item.description: Davey Todd took advantage of Michael Dunlop’s absence to break his lap record and win the Race of Legends at the Armoy Road Races.
item.dc:creator: 80239

item.title: Michael Dunlop explains why he withdrew from Armoy at 11th hour
item.description: Michael Dunlop pulled out of Armoy Road Racing, his home race, at late notice due to not being “treated on an equal and fair basis”.
item.dc:creator: 80239

item.title: "I'm an Isle of Man resident - we know the TT is dangerous but it's special too"
item.description: History, heritage and tradition are all things a typical Manx person like myself would associate with the TT. It is motorcycle racing at its purest; competitors compete for the thrill and prestige, rather than the money. Yet, there is another side to the TT, one that is in the back of every rider and spectators mind, but is not liked to be discussed - the danger.
item.dc:creator: 117149

item.title: “People don’t understand us” - tributes to the five deaths at Isle of Man TT
item.description: Peter Hickman has paid tributes to the five riders who died at the 2022 Isle of Man TT but offered a defence of the event: “We are here because we love it”.
item.dc:creator: 80239

item.title: Keith Huewen: Hickman 'magnificent', but five Isle of Man TT deaths 'horrendous'
item.description: With MotoGP taking a weekend off, Keith Huewen was present at the Isle of Man TT - his thoughts on an event that sadly claimed the lives of five competitors starts this week’s Crash.net MotoGP podcast.
item.dc:creator: 80239

item.title: Isle of Man TT launch ‘comprehensive investigation’ into deaths of five riders
item.description: The Isle of Man TT race organisers plan to investigate the manner of the deaths of five riders to offer “recommendations on the way the event will be delivered in the future”.
item.dc:creator: 114688

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT: Senior TT - Race Results (Saturday, June 11)
item.description: Results for Saturday's Milwaukee Senior TT race, at the 2022 Isle of Man TT.
item.dc:creator: 106384

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT | Hickman toasts terrific TT with fourth BMW win in Senior
item.description: Peter Hickman capped off a career-defining 2022 Isle of Man TT event with another faultless performance for victory in the Senior TT, his fourth win of the week on the Mountain Course
item.dc:creator: 72171

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT: Supersport & Sidecar - Race 2 Results (Friday, June 10)
item.description: Results for Friday's Supersport and Sidecar race 2, at the 2022 Isle of Man TT.
item.dc:creator: 106384

item.title: Father and son duo both killed in Isle of Man TT sidecar race
item.description: Roger Stockton and his son Bradley died at the Isle of Man TT in Saturday’s sidecar race.
item.dc:creator: 114688

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT | Birchall brothers claim second week of the week
item.description: Ben and Tom Birchall won a shortened 3wheeling.media Sidecar TT race on Friday afternoon at the 2022 Isle of Man TT, the race being stopped due to an incident at Ago’s Leap when the majority of competitors were on their second lap.
item.dc:creator: 114688

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT | Michael Dunlop shakes off Hickman for Supersport double
item.description: Michael Dunlop has moved another step closer towards breaking uncle Joey Dunlop’s all-time race winners’ record at the Isle of Man TT as he completed his second Supersport win of the week for a 21st career TT victory.
item.dc:creator: 72171

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT | Hickman wins Supertwins thriller as Dunlop heartache
item.description: Peter Hickman has clinched his third victory on the 2022 Isle of Man TT after prevailing an almighty scrap for honours in the Supertwins TT, a battle that was sadly decided prematurely when Michael Dunlop retired on the final lap.
item.dc:creator: 72171

item.title: Isle of Man TT: Supertwin TT - Race Results (June 8)
item.description: Results for Wednesday's Supertwin race (3 laps) at the 2022 Isle of Man TT.
item.dc:creator: 72168

item.title: ‘Mistaken identification’ in Isle of Man TT death; wrong rider pronounced dead
item.description: A case of “mistaken identification” at the 2022 Isle of Man TT has been clarified - Olivier Lavorel, believed to have died four days ago, is still alive but in critical condition. Cesar Chanal is “believed” to have died.
item.dc:creator: 114688

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man TT | Davy Morgan dies after Supersport TT crash
item.description: Organsiers for the Isle of Man TT have confirmed Davy Morgan has passed away following an accident during Monday's Supersport TT race [6 June].
item.dc:creator: 72171

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man Superstock TT | Hickman peerless in dominant SSTK TT victory
item.description: Peter Hickman has collected his second victory of race week at the 2022 Isle of Man TT after sprinting clear of the field in the shortened three-lap Superstock race.
item.dc:creator: 72171

item.title: 2022 Isle of Man Supersport TT | Dunlop fends off Harrison for 20th TT win
item.description: Michael Dunlop has become only the third competitor in Isle of Man TT history to achieve 20 victories after prevailing in a thrillingly close tussle with Dean Harrison for victory in the first of race week’s Supersport TT races.
item.dc:creator: 72171
